isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR CHECK BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Check Bracket on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the front cab door check Bracket (Item 3) at the cab hinge pillar (Item 4) and install two torx head bolts (Item 2) through front cab door check bracket and thread into cab hinge pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and tighten to 8 to 10 Lbf-ft (10.8 to 13.6 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door check bracket.

svcsubproc.title: Install Crew Cab Rear Door Check Bracket on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 50 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the crew cab rear door check bracket (Item 3) at the crew cab B pillar (Item 4) and install two torx head bolts (Item 2) through crew cab rear door check bracket and thread into crew cab B pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and tighten to 8 to 10 Lbf-ft (10.8 to 13.6 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side crew cab rear door check bracket.
